turns.text: I have! And it feels incredible knowing that I have been a part of something greater than myself. It really helps you shift your perspective about your own personal significance on this planet. You realize how infinitely important you are and yet at the same time how infinitely important another person is. When you have the ability to literally change another person's life with something so small...wow, it's life changing.
